info.title: keeper
info.description: Keeper backend to index analytic information for liquidity book CLMM

parameters.name: include_unknown
parameters.description: Include pool with unverified token. Default true.

parameters.name: pools_to_top
parameters.description: Pools to be sorted to top

parameters.name: include_unknown
parameters.description: Include pool with unverified token. Default true.

parameters.name: hide_low_tvl
parameters.description: Toggle pools with lower TVL than the value passed in

parameters.name: include_token_mints
parameters.description: Only include token mints. Allow list of token mints

parameters.name: include_pool_token_pairs
parameters.description: Only include pool token pairs. Allow list of pool token mints in format EPjFWdd5AufqSSqeM2qN1xzybapC8G4wEGGkZwyTDt1v-So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: pools_to_top
parameters.description: Pools to be sorted to top

parameters.name: include_unknown
parameters.description: Include pool with unverified token. Default true.

parameters.name: hide_low_tvl
parameters.description: Toggle pools with lower TVL than the value passed in

parameters.name: include_token_mints
parameters.description: Only include token mints. Allow list of token mints

parameters.name: include_pool_token_pairs
parameters.description: Only include pool token pairs. Allow list of pool token mints in format EPjFWdd5AufqSSqeM2qN1xzybapC8G4wEGGkZwyTDt1v-So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: pools_to_top
parameters.description: Pools to be sorted to top

parameters.name: include_unknown
parameters.description: Include pool with unverified token. Default true.

parameters.name: hide_low_tvl
parameters.description: Toggle pools with lower TVL than the value passed in

parameters.name: include_token_mints
parameters.description: Only include token mints. Allow list of token mints

parameters.name: include_pool_token_pairs
parameters.description: Only include pool token pairs. Allow list of pool token mints in format EPjFWdd5AufqSSqeM2qN1xzybapC8G4wEGGkZwyTDt1v-So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: lexical_order_mints
parameters.description: Lexical ordered token mints of the pair

parameters.name: num_of_days
parameters.description: Number of days before today. Max 255.

parameters.name: num_of_days
parameters.description: Number of days before today. Max 255.

parameters.name: num_of_days
parameters.description: Number of days before today. Max 255.

parameters.name: rows_to_take
parameters.description: Number of records to take. Max 255.

amount_x.description: Amount of token X in the bin. This already excluded protocol fees.

amount_x_in.description: Total token X swap into the bin. Only used for tracking purpose.

amount_y.description: Amount of token Y in the bin. This already excluded protocol fees.

amount_y_in.description: Total token Y swap into he bin. Only used for tracking purpose.

fee_amount_x_per_token_stored.description: Swap fee amount of token X per liquidity deposited.

fee_amount_y_per_token_stored.description: Swap fee amount of token Y per liquidity deposited.

liquidity_supply.description: Liquidities of the bin. This is the same as LP mint supply.

pair_address.description: Address of the liquidity pair for the position

token_x_usd_amount.description: Amount of token X in USD

token_y_usd_amount.description: Amount of token Y in USD

pair_address.description: Address of the liquidity pair for the position

reward_mint_address.description: Address of the farm reward claimed

token_usd_amount.description: Amount of reward token claimed in USD

pair_address.description: Address of the liquidity pair for the position

token_x_usd_amount.description: Amount of token X in USD

token_y_usd_amount.description: Amount of token Y in USD

fee_tvl_ratio.description: Fee TVL ratio in percentage in different timeframes

fees_24h.description: Trading fees earned in the last 24 hours

hide.description: Flag to indicate whether the pair should be shown in the UI

is_blacklisted.description: Flag to indicate whether the pair is blacklisted

liquidity.description: Total liquidity the liquidity pair holding. Also known as Total Value Locked

mint_x.description: Address of token X mint of the liquidity pair

mint_y.description: Address of token Y mint of the liquidity pair

protocol_fee_percentage.description: Protocol fee rate. A cut from trade fee.

reserve_x.description: Address of token X reserve of the liquidity pair

reserve_x_amount.description: Token X amount the liquidity pair hold

reserve_y.description: Address of token Y reserve of the liquidity pair

reserve_y_amount.description: Token Y amount the liquidity pair hold

reward_mint_x.description: Address of the farming reward X of the liquidity pair

reward_mint_y.description: Address of the farming reward Y of the liquidity pair

today_fees.description: Trading fees earned since the beginning of the day

trade_volume_24h.description: Trading volume in the last 24 hours

pair_address.description: Address of the liquidity pair for the position

total_fee_usd_claimed.description: Total fee has been claimed in USD

total_fee_x_claimed.description: Total fee X has been claimed

total_fee_y_claimed.description: Total fee Y has been claimed

total_reward_usd_claimed.description: Total farm reward has been claimed in USD

total_reward_x_claimed.description: Total farm reward X has been claimed

total_reward_y_claimed.description: Total farm reward Y has been claimed

cumulative_fee_x_amount.description: Accumulated fee X amount during the snapshot. This includes pending claimable fee.

cumulative_fee_y_amount.description: Accumulated fee Y amount during the snapshot. This includes pending claimable fee.

cumulative_reward_x_amount.description: Accumulated reward X amount during the snapshot. This includes pending claimable reward.

cumulative_reward_y_amount.description: Accumulated reward Y amount during the snapshot. This includes pending claimable reward.

pending_fee_x_amount.description: Amount of pending claimable fee X during the snapshot

pending_fee_y_amount.description: Amount of pending claimable fee Y during the snapshot

pending_reward_x_amount.description: Amount of pending claimable reward X during the snapshot

pending_reward_y_amount.description: Amount of pending claimable reward Y during the snapshot

reward_x_usd_rate.description: Reward X usd rate during the snapshot

reward_y_usd_rate.description: Reward Y usd rate during the snapshot

token_x_amount.description: Amount of token X the position is holding during the snapshot

token_x_usd_rate.description: Token X usd rate during the snapshot

token_y_amount.description: Amount of token Y the position is holding during the snapshot

token_y_usd_rate.description: Token Y usd rate during the snapshot

pair_address.description: Address of the liquidity pair for the position

total_fee_usd_claimed.description: Total fee has been claimed in USD

total_fee_x_claimed.description: Total fee X has been claimed

total_fee_y_claimed.description: Total fee Y has been claimed

total_reward_usd_claimed.description: Total farm reward has been claimed in USD

total_reward_x_claimed.description: Total farm reward X has been claimed

total_reward_y_claimed.description: Total farm reward Y has been claimed

end_bin_id.description: Ending bin ID for the swap

in_amount_usd.description: Amount of USD value swapped in

in_token.description: Address of the token swapped in

out_amount_usd.description: Amount of USD value swapped out

out_token.description: Address of the token swapped out

protocol_fee_usd.description: Amount of protocol fee charged in USD

start_bin_id.description: Starting bin ID for the swap

trade_fee_usd.description: Amount of fee charged in USD

total_fee_usd_claimed.description: Total fee amount has been claimed by the wallet in USD

total_fee_x_claimed.description: Total fee x has been claimed by the wallet

total_fee_y_claimed.description: Total fee y has been claimed by the wallet

total_reward_usd_claimed.description: Total farm reward amount has been claimed by the wallet in USD

total_reward_x_claimed.description: Total reward x has been claimed by the wallet

total_reward_y_claimed.description: Total reward y has been claimed by the wallet
